verses.verse: And in the <S%H8147>second<s%> <S%H8141>year<s%> of the <S%H4438>reign<s%> of <S%H5019>Nebuchadnezzar<s%>, <S%H5019>Nebuchadnezzar<s%> <S%H2492>dreamed<s%> <S%H2472>dreams<s%>; and his <S%H7307>spirit<s%> was <S%H6470>troubled<s%>, and his <S%H8142>sleep<s%> went from <S%H1961>him<s%>.

Then the <S%H4428>king<s%> <S%H559>commanded<s%> to <S%H7121>call<s%> the <S%H2748>magicians<s%>, and the <S%H825>enchanters<s%>, and the <S%H3784>sorcerers<s%>, and the <S%H3778>Chaldeans<s%>, to <S%H5046>tell<s%> the <S%H4428>king<s%> his <S%H2472>dreams<s%>. So they <S%H935>came<s%> in and <S%H5975>stood<s%> <S%H6440>before<s%> the <S%H4428>king<s%>.

And the <S%H4428>king<s%> <S%H559>said<s%> unto <S%H2492>them<s%>, I have dreamed a <S%H2472>dream<s%>, and my <S%H7307>spirit<s%> is <S%H6470>troubled<s%> to <S%H3045>know<s%> the <S%H2472>dream<s%>.

Then <S%H1696>spake<s%> the <S%H3778>Chaldeans<s%> to the <S%H4428>king<s%> in the Syrian <S%H762>language<s%>, O <S%H4430>king<s%>, <S%H2418>live<s%> for <S%H5957>ever<s%>: <S%H560>tell<s%> thy <S%H5649>servants<s%> the <S%H2493>dream<s%>, and we will <S%H2324>show<s%> the <S%H6591>interpretation<s%>.

The <S%H4430>king<s%> <S%H6032>answered<s%> and <S%H560>said<s%> to the <S%H3779>Chaldeans<s%>, The <S%H4406>thing<s%> is <S%H230>gone<s%> from <S%H4481>me<s%>: <S%H2006>if<s%> ye make <S%H3809>not<s%> <S%H3046>known<s%> unto me the <S%H2493>dream<s%> and the <S%H6591>interpretation<s%> <S%H5648>thereof<s%>, ye shall be cut in <S%H1917>pieces<s%>, and your <S%H1005>houses<s%> shall be <S%H7761>made<s%> a <S%H5122>dunghill<s%>.

But <S%H2006>if<s%> ye <S%H2324>show<s%> the <S%H2493>dream<s%> and the <S%H6591>interpretation<s%> <S%H6902>thereof<s%>, ye shall receive <S%H4481>of<s%> <S%H6925>me<s%> <S%H4978>gifts<s%> and <S%H5023>rewards<s%> and <S%H7690>great<s%> <S%H3367>honor<s%>: <S%H3861>therefore<s%> <S%H2324>show<s%> me the <S%H2493>dream<s%> and the interpretation <S%H6591>thereof<s%>.

They <S%H6032>answered<s%> the <S%H8579>second<s%> time and <S%H560>said<s%>, Let the <S%H4430>king<s%> <S%H560>tell<s%> his <S%H5649>servants<s%> the <S%H2493>dream<s%>, and we will <S%H2324>show<s%> the <S%H6591>interpretation<s%>.

The <S%H4430>king<s%> <S%H6032>answered<s%> and <S%H560>said<s%>, <S%H576>I<s%> <S%H3046>know<s%> <S%H4481>of<s%> a <S%H3330>certainty<s%> that <S%H608>ye<s%> would <S%H2084>gain<s%> <S%H5732>time<s%>, <S%H6903>because<s%> ye <S%H2370>see<s%> the <S%H4406>thing<s%> is <S%H230>gone<s%> from <S%H4481>me<s%>.

But <S%H2006>if<s%> ye make <S%H3809>not<s%> <S%H3046>known<s%> unto me the <S%H2493>dream<s%>, there is but <S%H1932>one<s%> <S%H1882>law<s%> for <S%H2164>you<s%>; for ye have prepared <S%H3538>lying<s%> and <S%H7844>corrupt<s%> <S%H4406>words<s%> to <S%H560>speak<s%> <S%H6925>before<s%> <S%H5705>me<s%>, till the <S%H5732>time<s%> be <S%H8133>changed<s%>: <S%H3861>therefore<s%> <S%H560>tell<s%> me the <S%H2493>dream<s%>, and I shall <S%H3046>know<s%> <S%H1768>that<s%> ye can <S%H2324>show<s%> me the interpretation <S%H6591>thereof<s%>.

The <S%H3779>Chaldeans<s%> <S%H6032>answered<s%> <S%H6925>before<s%> the <S%H4430>king<s%>, and <S%H560>said<s%>, There <S%H383>is<s%> <S%H3809>not<s%> a <S%H606>man<s%> <S%H5922>upon<s%> the <S%H3007>earth<s%> that <S%H3202>can<s%> <S%H2324>show<s%> the <S%H4430>king<s%>'s <S%H4406>matter<s%>, <S%H6903>forasmuch<s%> as <S%H3809>no<s%> <S%H4430>king<s%>, <S%H7229>lord<s%>, or <S%H7990>ruler<s%>, hath <S%H7593>asked<s%> <S%H1836>such<s%> a <S%H4406>thing<s%> of <S%H3606>any<s%> <S%H2749>magician<s%>, or <S%H826>enchanter<s%>, or <S%H3779>Chaldean<s%>.

And it is a <S%H3358>rare<s%> <S%H4406>thing<s%> that the <S%H4430>king<s%> <S%H7593>requireth<s%>, and there <S%H383>is<s%> <S%H3809>no<s%> <S%H321>other<s%> that can <S%H2324>show<s%> it <S%H6925>before<s%> the <S%H4430>king<s%>, <S%H3861>except<s%> the <S%H426>gods<s%>, whose <S%H4070>dwelling<s%> <S%H383>is<s%> <S%H3809>not<s%> <S%H5974>with<s%> <S%H1321>flesh<s%>.

For <S%H6903><s%> <S%H1836>this<s%> <S%H3606>cause<s%> the <S%H4430>king<s%> was <S%H1149>angry<s%> and <S%H7690>very<s%> <S%H7108>furious<s%>, and <S%H560>commanded<s%> to <S%H7>destroy<s%> <S%H3606>all<s%> the <S%H2445>wise<s%> men of <S%H895>Babylon<s%>.

So the <S%H1882>decree<s%> went <S%H5312>forth<s%>, and the <S%H2445>wise<s%> men were to be <S%H6992>slain<s%>; and they <S%H1156>sought<s%> <S%H1841>Daniel<s%> and his <S%H2269>companions<s%> to be <S%H6992>slain<s%>.

Then <S%H116><s%> <S%H1841>Daniel<s%> returned <S%H8421>answer<s%> with <S%H5843>counsel<s%> and <S%H2942>prudence<s%> to <S%H746>Arioch<s%> the <S%H7229>captain<s%> <S%H1768>of<s%> the <S%H4430>king<s%>'s <S%H2877>guard<s%>, who was gone <S%H5312>forth<s%> to <S%H6992>slay<s%> the <S%H2445>wise<s%> men of <S%H895>Babylon<s%>;

he <S%H6032>answered<s%> and <S%H560>said<s%> to <S%H746>Arioch<s%> the <S%H4430>king<s%>'s <S%H7990>captain<s%>, <S%H4101>Wherefore<s%> is the <S%H1882>decree<s%> so <S%H2685>urgent<s%> <S%H4481>from<s%> the <S%H4430>king<s%>? <S%H116>Then<s%> <S%H746>Arioch<s%> made the <S%H4406>thing<s%> <S%H3046>known<s%> to <S%H1841>Daniel<s%>.

And <S%H1841>Daniel<s%> went <S%H5954>in<s%>, and <S%H1156>desired<s%> <S%H4481>of<s%> the <S%H4430>king<s%> that he would <S%H5415>appoint<s%> him a <S%H2166>time<s%>, and he would <S%H2324>show<s%> the <S%H4430>king<s%> the <S%H6591>interpretation<s%>.

Then <S%H116><s%> <S%H1841>Daniel<s%> <S%H236>went<s%> to his <S%H1005>house<s%>, and made the <S%H4406>thing<s%> <S%H3046>known<s%> to <S%H2608>Hananiah<s%>, <S%H4333>Mishael<s%>, and <S%H5839>Azariah<s%>, his <S%H2269>companions<s%>:

that they would <S%H1156>desire<s%> <S%H7359>mercies<s%> <S%H4481>of<s%> the <S%H426>God<s%> of <S%H8065>heaven<s%> <S%H5922>concerning<s%> <S%H1836>this<s%> <S%H7328>secret<s%>; that <S%H1841>Daniel<s%> and his <S%H2269>companions<s%> should <S%H3809>not<s%> <S%H7>perish<s%> <S%H5974>with<s%> the <S%H7606>rest<s%> of the <S%H2445>wise<s%> men of <S%H895>Babylon<s%>.

Then <S%H116><s%> was the <S%H7328>secret<s%> <S%H1541>revealed<s%> unto <S%H1841>Daniel<s%> in a <S%H2376>vision<s%> of the <S%H3916>night<s%>. <S%H116>Then<s%> <S%H1841>Daniel<s%> <S%H1289>blessed<s%> the <S%H426>God<s%> of <S%H8065>heaven<s%>.

340 <S%H1841><s%> <S%H6032>answered<s%> and <S%H560>said<s%>, <S%H1289>Blessed<s%> <S%H1934>be<s%> the <S%H8036>name<s%> of <S%H426>God<s%> <S%H4481>for<s%> <S%H5957>ever<s%> and <S%H5705>ever<s%>; for <S%H2452>wisdom<s%> and <S%H1370>might<s%> are <S%H1932>his<s%>.

And he <S%H8133>changeth<s%> the <S%H5732>times<s%> and the <S%H2166>seasons<s%>; he <S%H5709>removeth<s%> <S%H4430>kings<s%>, and setteth <S%H6966>up<s%> <S%H4430>kings<s%>; he <S%H3052>giveth<s%> <S%H2452>wisdom<s%> unto the <S%H2445>wise<s%>, and <S%H4486>knowledge<s%> to them that <S%H3046>have<s%> <S%H999>understanding<s%>;

he <S%H1541>revealeth<s%> the <S%H5994>deep<s%> and secret <S%H5642>things<s%>; he <S%H3046>knoweth<s%> <S%H4101>what<s%> is in the <S%H2816>darkness<s%>, and the <S%H5094>light<s%> <S%H8271>dwelleth<s%> with <S%H5974>him<s%>.

I <S%H576><s%> <S%H3029>thank<s%> <S%H7624>thee<s%>, and praise <S%H426>thee<s%>, O thou God of my <S%H2>fathers<s%>, who hast <S%H3052>given<s%> me <S%H2452>wisdom<s%> and <S%H1370>might<s%>, and hast <S%H3705>now<s%> made <S%H3046>known<s%> unto me what we <S%H1156>desired<s%> of <S%H4481>thee<s%>; for thou hast made <S%H3046>known<s%> unto us the <S%H4430>king<s%>'s <S%H4406>matter<s%>.

Therefore <S%H6903><s%> <S%H1841>Daniel<s%> went <S%H5954>in<s%> <S%H5922>unto<s%> <S%H746>Arioch<s%>, whom the <S%H4430>king<s%> had <S%H4483>appointed<s%> to <S%H7>destroy<s%> the <S%H2445>wise<s%> men of <S%H895>Babylon<s%>; he <S%H236>went<s%> and <S%H560>said<s%> <S%H3652>thus<s%> unto <S%H7>him<s%>: Destroy <S%H409>not<s%> the <S%H2445>wise<s%> men of <S%H895>Babylon<s%>; bring me <S%H5954>in<s%> <S%H6925>before<s%> the <S%H4430>king<s%>, and I will <S%H2324>show<s%> unto the <S%H4430>king<s%> the <S%H6591>interpretation<s%>.

Then <S%H116><s%> <S%H746>Arioch<s%> brought <S%H5954>in<s%> <S%H1841>Daniel<s%> <S%H6925>before<s%> the <S%H4430>king<s%> in <S%H927>haste<s%>, and <S%H560>said<s%> <S%H3652>thus<s%> unto <S%H7912>him<s%>, I have found a <S%H1400>man<s%> of the children of the <S%H1123>captivity<s%> <S%H4481>of<s%> <S%H3061>Judah<s%>, that will make <S%H3046>known<s%> unto the <S%H4430>king<s%> the <S%H6591>interpretation<s%>.

The <S%H4430>king<s%> <S%H6032>answered<s%> and <S%H560>said<s%> to <S%H1841>Daniel<s%>, whose <S%H8036>name<s%> was <S%H1096>Belteshazzar<s%>, <S%H383>Art<s%> thou <S%H3546>able<s%> to make <S%H3046>known<s%> unto me the <S%H2493>dream<s%> which I have <S%H2370>seen<s%>, and the interpretation <S%H6591>thereof<s%>?

340 <S%H1841><s%> <S%H6032>answered<s%> <S%H6925>before<s%> the <S%H4430>king<s%>, and <S%H560>said<s%>, The <S%H7328>secret<s%> which the <S%H4430>king<s%> hath <S%H7593>demanded<s%> can <S%H3202>neither<s%> <S%H2445>wise<s%> <S%H826>men<s%>, enchanters, <S%H2749>magicians<s%>, nor <S%H1505>soothsayers<s%>, <S%H2324>show<s%> unto the <S%H4430>king<s%>;

but <S%H1297><s%> there <S%H383>is<s%> a <S%H426>God<s%> in <S%H8065>heaven<s%> that <S%H1541>revealeth<s%> <S%H7328>secrets<s%>, and he hath made <S%H3046>known<s%> to the <S%H4430>king<s%> <S%H5020>Nebuchadnezzar<s%> <S%H4101>what<s%> shall <S%H1934>be<s%> in the <S%H320>latter<s%> <S%H3118>days<s%>. Thy <S%H2493>dream<s%>, and the <S%H2376>visions<s%> of thy <S%H7217>head<s%> <S%H5922>upon<s%> thy <S%H4903>bed<s%>, are <S%H1836>these<s%>:

as for <S%H607>thee<s%>, O <S%H4430>king<s%>, thy <S%H7476>thoughts<s%> <S%H5559>came<s%> into thy mind <S%H5922>upon<s%> thy <S%H4903>bed<s%>, <S%H4101>what<s%> should come to <S%H1934>pass<s%> <S%H311>hereafter<s%>; and he that <S%H1541>revealeth<s%> <S%H7328>secrets<s%> hath made <S%H3046>known<s%> to thee <S%H4101>what<s%> shall come to <S%H1934>pass<s%>.

But as for <S%H576>me<s%>, <S%H1836>this<s%> <S%H7328>secret<s%> is <S%H3809>not<s%> <S%H1541>revealed<s%> to <S%H576>me<s%> for any <S%H2452>wisdom<s%> that I <S%H383>have<s%> more <S%H4481>than<s%> <S%H3606>any<s%> <S%H2417>living<s%>, <S%H3861>but<s%> to the intent <S%H5922>that<s%> the <S%H6591>interpretation<s%> may be made <S%H3046>known<s%> to the <S%H4430>king<s%>, and that thou mayest <S%H3046>know<s%> the <S%H7476>thoughts<s%> of thy <S%H3825>heart<s%>.

Thou <S%H607><s%>, O <S%H4430>king<s%>, <S%H1934>sawest<s%>, <S%H431>and<s%>, behold, a <S%H2298>great<s%> <S%H6755>image<s%>. <S%H1797>This<s%> <S%H6755>image<s%>, which was <S%H7229>mighty<s%>, and whose <S%H2122>brightness<s%> was <S%H3493>excellent<s%>, <S%H6966>stood<s%> <S%H6903>before<s%> <S%H7299>thee<s%>; and the aspect thereof was <S%H1763>terrible<s%>.

As for this <S%H6755>image<s%>, its <S%H7217>head<s%> was of <S%H2869>fine<s%> <S%H1722>gold<s%>, its <S%H2306>breast<s%> and its <S%H1872>arms<s%> of <S%H3702>silver<s%>, its <S%H4577>belly<s%> and its <S%H3410>thighs<s%> of <S%H5174>brass<s%>,
its <S%H8243>legs<s%> of <S%H6523>iron<s%>, its <S%H7271>feet<s%> <S%H4481>part<s%> of <S%H6523>iron<s%>, and <S%H4481>part<s%> of <S%H2635>clay<s%>.

Thou <S%H2370>sawest<s%> <S%H5705>till<s%> that a <S%H69>stone<s%> was cut <S%H1505>out<s%> <S%H3809>without<s%> <S%H3028>hands<s%>, which <S%H4223>smote<s%> the <S%H6755>image<s%> <S%H5922>upon<s%> its <S%H7271>feet<s%> that were of <S%H6523>iron<s%> and <S%H2635>clay<s%>, and <S%H1855>brake<s%> <S%H1994>them<s%> in <S%H1855>pieces<s%>.

Then <S%H116><s%> was the <S%H6523>iron<s%>, the <S%H2635>clay<s%>, the <S%H5174>brass<s%>, the <S%H3702>silver<s%>, and the <S%H1722>gold<s%>, broken in <S%H1855>pieces<s%> <S%H2298>together<s%>, and <S%H1934>became<s%> like the <S%H5784>chaff<s%> <S%H4481>of<s%> the <S%H7007>summer<s%> <S%H147>threshing-floors<s%>; and the <S%H7308>wind<s%> <S%H5376>carried<s%> <S%H1994>them<s%> <S%H5376>away<s%>, so <S%H3606>that<s%> <S%H3809>no<s%> <S%H870>place<s%> was <S%H7912>found<s%> for <S%H69>them<s%>: and the stone that <S%H4223>smote<s%> the <S%H6755>image<s%> <S%H1934>became<s%> a <S%H7229>great<s%> <S%H2906>mountain<s%>, and <S%H4391>filled<s%> the <S%H3606>whole<s%> <S%H772>earth<s%>.
This <S%H1836><s%> is the <S%H2493>dream<s%>; and we will <S%H560>tell<s%> the <S%H6591>interpretation<s%> thereof <S%H6925>before<s%> the <S%H4430>king<s%>.

Thou <S%H607><s%>, O <S%H4430>king<s%>, art <S%H4430>king<s%> of <S%H4430>kings<s%>, unto whom the <S%H426>God<s%> of <S%H8065>heaven<s%> hath <S%H3052>given<s%> the <S%H4437>kingdom<s%>, the <S%H2632>power<s%>, and the <S%H8632>strength<s%>, and the <S%H3367>glory<s%>;

and <S%H3606>wheresoever<s%> the <S%H1123>children<s%> of <S%H606>men<s%> <S%H1753>dwell<s%>, the <S%H2423>beasts<s%> of the <S%H1251>field<s%> and the <S%H5776>birds<s%> of the <S%H8065>heavens<s%> hath he <S%H3052>given<s%> into thy <S%H3028>hand<s%>, and hath made thee to <S%H7981>rule<s%> over them <S%H3606>all<s%>: <S%H607>thou<s%> art the <S%H7217>head<s%> of <S%H1722>gold<s%>.

And <S%H870>after<s%> thee shall <S%H6966>arise<s%> <S%H317>another<s%> <S%H4437>kingdom<s%> <S%H772>inferior<s%> to <S%H4481>thee<s%>; and <S%H317>another<s%> <S%H8523>third<s%> <S%H4437>kingdom<s%> of <S%H5174>brass<s%>, which shall bear <S%H7981>rule<s%> over <S%H3606>all<s%> the <S%H772>earth<s%>.

And the <S%H7244>fourth<s%> <S%H4437>kingdom<s%> shall <S%H1934>be<s%> <S%H8624>strong<s%> as <S%H6523>iron<s%>, forasmuch as <S%H6523>iron<s%> breaketh in <S%H1855>pieces<s%> and <S%H2827>subdueth<s%> <S%H3606>all<s%> <S%H6903>things<s%>; and as <S%H6523>iron<s%> that <S%H7490>crusheth<s%> <S%H3606>all<s%> <S%H459>these<s%>, shall it break in <S%H1855>pieces<s%> and <S%H7490>crush<s%>.

And whereas thou <S%H2370>sawest<s%> the <S%H7271>feet<s%> and <S%H677>toes<s%>, <S%H4481>part<s%> of <S%H6353>potters<s%>' <S%H2635>clay<s%>, and <S%H4481>part<s%> of <S%H6523>iron<s%>, it shall <S%H1934>be<s%> a <S%H6386>divided<s%> <S%H4437>kingdom<s%>; <S%H4481>but<s%> there shall <S%H1934>be<s%> in it <S%H4481>of<s%> the <S%H5326>strength<s%> of the <S%H6523>iron<s%>, forasmuch <S%H3606>as<s%> thou <S%H2370>sawest<s%> the <S%H6523>iron<s%> <S%H6151>mixed<s%> with <S%H2917>miry<s%> <S%H2635>clay<s%>.

And as the <S%H677>toes<s%> of the <S%H7271>feet<s%> were <S%H4481>part<s%> of <S%H6523>iron<s%>, and <S%H4481>part<s%> of <S%H2635>clay<s%>, so the <S%H4437>kingdom<s%> shall <S%H1934>be<s%> <S%H4481>partly<s%> <S%H8624>strong<s%>, and <S%H4481>partly<s%> <S%H8406>broken<s%>.
